name: IronWolf: Free Non-VR Edition
description:
IronWolf was originally designed from the ground up for VR and we're excited to make a standalone NON-VR version of the game that's free for everyone. This free version includes all of the missions from the original IronWolf VR as well as the randomly generated missions, however it does not include the map based OpenWorld gameplay, submarine upgrades or leaderboards.

If you want to experience this in VR or if you want to enjoy the OpenWorld Gameplay and other features check out IronWolf VR.

Unleash torpedoes on enemy ships, shoot down fighters and bombers using anti-aircraft guns, and attempt to survive depth charges dropped by deadly destroyers.

Gameplay
  • Fast paced shooting to repel enemy planes with the .50 cal machine gun
  • Stealthily hunt enemy merchant convoys
  • Duel with enemy destroyers, frigates and battleships

Single and Multi player
  • Cooperative online multiplayer
  • Play on your own by enabling assists to your requirements
